means: 繁琐的程序，费时的手续

PerfectNetExp.abs: rigidness 坚硬rigmarole 废话rigmarolish 冗长废话的
说话1_英语学习教室_新浪博客 ... prolixity n. 啰唆 rigmarole n. 冗长的废话 tautological adj. 用语重复的（冗赘的）.
rigmarole 冗长无聊的废话 ruthless 残忍的,无情的 sacrosanct 神圣不可侵犯的 scourge 鞭笞, 折磨, 使 ... 痛苦, 严惩 screen 掩蔽, 包庇, 放映, 拍摄, 筛.
里氏词典提供rigmarole 的意思,rigmarole的解释,rigmarole的翻译,方便你的学习和生活...  冗长的, 无条理的rigmarole [ noun ] a set of confused and meaningless.

list.abs: all that academic rigmarole was a waste of time ., 所有的理论上的胡言乱语都是浪费时间.
but publicly traded companies are frequently mispriced , and all the legal rigmarole can put rival buyers off .但公开上市公司的价值经常被错估，拖沓冗长的法律程序可能会让竞争买家丧失兴趣。
...ads stupendous innumerable spate glut(过量) peck(啄痕)冗余otiose redundant superfluous rigmarole沼泽 mire bog morass marsh swamp bog困境 plight quanda.
I ' ve never heard such rigmarole ., 我从来没听过像这样的长篇废话.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 18th cent.: apparently an alteration of ragman roll, originally denoting a legal document recording a list of offences

entry.tran: 冗长复杂的过程;繁琐的程序
entry.def: You can describe a long and complicated process as a rigmarole .

example.ex: Then the whole rigmarole starts over again...
example.tran: 然后，整个漫长复杂的过程又重新开始了。

example.ex: I couldn't be bothered to go through the rigmarole of changing clothes.
example.tran: 我不想再费事儿换衣服了。

means.word_mean: 1. a set of confused and meaningless statements
2. a long and complicated and confusing procedure;

sentences.sentence: "all that academic rigmarole was a waste of time"

auth_sentence.content: This story of yours is becoming rather a rigmarole.
auth_sentence.res_content: This story of yours is becoming rather a rigmarole.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This story of yours is becoming rather a rigmarole.

auth_sentence.content: Difficult to stop this rigmarole of explanation.
auth_sentence.res_content: Difficult to stop this rigmarole of explanation.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Difficult to stop this rigmarole of explanation.

auth_sentence.content: This is part of the rigmarole that comes with it, and if I'm honest, I am very pleased.
auth_sentence.res_content: This is part of the rigmarole that comes with it, and if I'm honest, I am very pleased.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This is part of the rigmarole that comes with it, and if I'm honest, I am very pleased.

means.word_mean: 繁琐的程序;费时的手续

sentences.en: He had to go through the usual rigmarole of signing legal papers in order to complete the business deal.
sentences.cn: 为了达成这笔交易，他不得不一一通过通常的签署法律文件的繁琐程序。

sentences.en: I’ve never heard such a rigmarole.
sentences.cn: 我从来没听过像这样的长篇废话。
